item.description:
Hi Everyone!! Hope you and all the puggies are doing well.

We'll have our June Meet Up on Sunday, June 27th from 11am to 1pm. If the weather calls for it, we'll bring the pool out for the puggies to splash around in.

Those of you attending for the first time, please check in at the front desk and bring vaccine records for rabies, distemper and canine cough.

If anyone would like to schedule a grooming for after the meetup, please let me know ahead of time so I can make sure my groomer is still here.

Looking forward to seeing everyone again and would love to have a big turn out this month!!

Agni
item.name: JUNE PUG MEET
